verses.verse: (The Happy Home of the Faithful) A Song of Ascents. (Ps 112.1; 119.3) Happy is everyone who fears the LORD, who walks in his ways.
(Eccl 8.12; Isa 3.10; Ezek 23.29) You shall eat the fruit of the labor of your hands; you shall be happy, and it shall go well with you.
(Ps 52.8; 144.12; Ezek 19.10) Your wife will be like a fruitful vine within your house; your children will be like olive shoots around your table.
Thus shall the man be blessed who fears the LORD.
(Ps 20.2; 122.9; 134.3) The LORD bless you from Zion. May you see the prosperity of Jerusalem all the days of your life.
(Gen 50.23; Job 42.16; Ps 125.5) May you see your childrenâ€™s children. Peace be upon Israel!
